normalised: Organic farming, eh? My granddad, Ramlal Ji, in Rajasthan, always said "go natural"! He used desi ghee for everything too. I remember seeing him till the land around six A M on tenth july two thousand. Now everyone talks about it! Even institutes like I A R I are researching it. Hope it really takes off by, say, two thousand and twenty five. Seems like a good path to a healthier Bharat, right? Though those organic prices can be a bit much, even at eighteen hundred hours! What do you think, folks?
